results.title: Successful rhIGF1 treatment for over 5 years in a patient with severe insulin resistance due to homozygous insulin receptor mutation.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was treated with twice daily injections of rhIGF1 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for more than 5 years with improvement in her @DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperkeratosis_Epidermolytic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017488 @@@hyperkeratosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertrichosis @DISEASE_MESH:D006983 @@@hypertrichosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Carmody D, Ladsaria SS, Buikema RK, Semple RK, Greeley SA. Successful rhIGF1 treatment for over 5 years in a patient with severe insulin resistance due to homozygous insulin receptor mutation. Diabet Med. 2016 Mar;33(3):e8-e12. PMID: 26262567
